Company.Name: UBM
Company.Description:
UBM

Unlimited Business Machines is a multinational computer technology.
The company has been known through most of its recent history as the world's
largest computer company.With over 600.000 employees worldwide.
UBM is the largest and most profitable information technology employer in the world.

Story.StoryInfo:
You just finished your masters degree
and after months of job hunting you finally
found a job in UBM as a project manager.
This is your first job so you got lots of stuff to learn...

Good Luck.
